title: Ai-san’s Deluxe Surprise Special!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>H-How is it, Kana-chan...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hm... nom nom...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Well!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Say something already~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Wha-!? Oh, sorry! I was just so lost in the flavor!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>So...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ai-chan’s Deluxe Surprise Special Monja is the best!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yeah!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hey, hey, what’s that light sweetness in there? Kanata-chan wants to know!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ehehe, there’s actually some chestnut paste in it♪ That’s what makes it a “surprise” special!! Ahaha~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>That’s genius!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
